definition: the quality of being pretentious (behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth)
details:
noun
- the quality of being pretentious (behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth)
= synonyms: pretension
- the property of having a relatively great size
= synonyms: bigness
- large or extensive in breadth or importance or comprehensiveness
= example: large or extensive in breadth or importance or comprehensiveness
= synonyms: extensiveness
- the capacity to understand a broad range of topics
= synonyms: breadth, comprehensiveness
